name: AnkiDroid

projects.summary: Developing a feature for users to manage multiple profiles within AnkiDroid.
Creating a reminder system to prompt users for reviews of their notes.
Implementing a preview feature for different note types in the note editor.
Enhancing the user interface for better usability on tablets and Chromebooks.
Adding extra widgets for improved functionality and user experience.
